subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: From 2011 to 2014, Freeman had 13 home runs and 59 runs batted in against the Mets in 71 games, but this year, the Mets are on the rise.
snippet: From 2011 to 2014, Freeman had 13 home runs and 59 runs batted in against the Mets in 71 games, but this year, the Mets are on the rise.
